results.title: Simvastatin protects bladder and renal functions following spinal cord injury in rats
results.text_hl: Moreover, @DISEASE_Spinal_Cord_Injuries @DISEASE_MESH:D013119 @@@SCI@@@-induced renal @GENE_CASP3 @GENE_25402 @@@caspase-3@@@ activity was significantly decreased in the @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ group indicating the ability of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ to reduce the @<m>DISEASE_Acidosis_Renal_Tubular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000141 @@@renal tubular apoptosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Shunmugavel A, Khan M, Te Chou PC, Dhindsa RK, Martin MM, Copay AG, Subach BR, Schuler TC, Bilgen M, Orak JK, Singh I. Simvastatin protects bladder and renal functions following spinal cord injury in rats J Inflamm (Lond). 2010 Apr 19;7():17. PMID: 20403180
